text:
February 2, 1955
Mr. Seymour N. Siegel
Director, WNYC
Municipal Broadcasting System
Municipal Building
New York, New York
Dear Si:
Will you do two more things regarding Prix Italia:
1. Prepare a story regarding the Prix Italia
prizes in radio and television for the March 1 issue
of NAEB Newsletter, Copy must be here no later than
February 25.
2. Indicate any specific recommendations regarding
action the Board of Directors (or Executive Committee)
should take regarding Prix Italia for 1955. This
recommendation or recommendations should be received no
later than February 17,
Thanks for sending along the dope to date.
Sincerely,
FESilteh
Frank E. Schooley
President
